CatDescriptText: Mrs. Rahodella Heard, 3632 Frazier Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1958, pg. A1 question reads: "Do you think people follow political leadership more than religious leadership? Why?" answer reads: "The majority of the people follow the religious leader.  I, myself, think that way and do so myself."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Rahodella Heard, wearing light colored jacket and dress with three buttons and double layered collar, holding bags in left arm, standing on Liberty Avenue with Mellon Bank in background, Downtown
